name: Cops
overview: Europe in the near future... Several cities have merged into EURO-CITY - a vast metropolis of 30 million people. Corruption and gangsterism has turned Euro-City into a war zone. Enter the city's toughest cops: Mike "Mad Dog" McTavish and Singh "Big Bang" Kapoor. They must crush the gangs and bring down the crime bosses - no matter how high up they are!
